#define pb(a) push_back(a)
using namespace std;
template<class T>T gcd(T a,T b){return (b==0)?a:gcd(b,a%b);}
template<class T>T lcm(T a,T b){return (a*b)/gcd(a,b);}
int n,a[100005],b,t,hash[100005],k,N;
vector<int>v,ar;
vector<int>::iterator up;
int main()
{
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
  cin>>n>>k;
  CLEAR(hash);
  for(int i=0;i<k;i++){
  cin>>a[i];
  hash[a[i]]=i+1;
   }
  for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
  {
    cin>>b;
    if(hash[b]!=0)
    ar.pb(hash[b]);
  }
  N=ar.size();
  if(N==0)
  {
  	printf("0\n");
  	return 0;
  }
  
  v.pb(ar[0]);
  for(int i=1;i<N;i++)
  {
  	up=upper_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),ar[i]);
  //	if(up!=v.begin()&&(*(up-1))==a[i])                        uncomment these lines to get longest monotonic increasing subsequence
  //	continue;
  	if(up==v.end())
  	v.pb(ar[i]);
  	else
  	*up=ar[i];
  }
  cout<<v.size()<<"\n";
  v.clear();
  ar.clear();
  }
  return 0;
}
